description: This file defines a React functional component 'Board' for rendering a 3x3 Tic Tac Toe grid, handling cell rendering, highlighting winning lines, and delegating cell click events to parent components.

methods.name: Board({ squares, onCellClick, winningLine, disabled })
methods.description: React functional component that renders the game board, with props controlling the squares, click handling, winning line highlighting, and disabled state.
